name: Remembrance
description:
Artist Alya wake up on the banks of a river with no memories and only a journal, painting supplies, and a ticket for a train that leaves in 5 days. You have until then to recover her memories.

And with every choice changing how the game plays out...

Good luck!

Features
  • Pixel-style aesthetics keeps focus on story
  • Simple controls, but not a simple plot
  • Story-centric RPG where every choice you make changes how the game plays out
  • Each playthrough can take between 1-2 hours, but multiple playthroughs necessary if you want to uncover the whole story
  • No combat, but plenty to do... you play an artist after all
